hint: Filter dimension tables first, push filters into CTEs, and materialize repeated patterns to reduce join cardinality early and safely.
Isolate all filtered dimension tables into separate CTEs before joining with the fact table, enabling better predicate pushdown and join ordering.
Pre-filter and pre-join key dimensions with the fact table in staged CTEs, then join remaining dimensions, restructuring the query for sequential filtering.
Transform OR conditions into UNION ALL branches, decorrelate complex predicates into separate CTEs, and split union branches for optimal index/partition usage.
